boat.name: Boy Frank
boat.short_description: 'Boy Frank' is a Great Yarmouth shrimper, built in 1957 by Gus, Leigh & Boswell. She is sister ship to 'Horace & Hannah'.

for_sales.sales_text:
Three years ago Robert Simper (one of the founder members of the OGA) persuaded me to take on, as a retirement job, the restoration of "Boy Frank" a 1957 Yarmouth shrimper. 

A subsequent stroke, other problems and four grandchildren has made me realise I could not find the time to restore the boat. I am looking to give it away as a restoration project. The .oat is presently covered on a trailer in a boat park opposite Felixstowe Ferry. The trailer is included but needs new tyres and some work to make it road legal. The boat"s engine was working prior to flooding, when the starter was damaged. Lots of spars, mast and various parts included.

She needs lots of TLC to bring her back to life.
for_sales.summary: Sold for Â£5 summer 2020 and taken to a boat builder for restoration
